general.gigTitle: do wordpress website development, redesign business wordpress website design

sellerCard.oneLiner: Experts in WordPress, Shopify, Custom Web, and Mobile App Development
sellerCard.description: Introducing Coding Avenue, your digital digital agency with over 6+ years of industry expertise. We specialize in web development across platforms like WordPress, Shopify, Web flow and Wix, along with mobile app development and UI UX design. Our strength lies in crafting digital Presence uniquely tailored to your goals. At Coding Avenue, our clients are our top priority. We combine skill and creativity to fuel your online success.

description.content:
Hello Entrepreneurs & Business Owners,

If you've landed here, chances are you're looking for a skilled WordPress developer to create a professional, high-performing website or give your existing site a modern redesign. Whether you need a business website, an eCommerce store, or a service-based platform, we're here to bring your vision to life with a sleek, responsive, and SEO-optimized design.


Portfolio: https://www.fiverr.com/s/zWB9Lme


What I Offer in this gig:

  • Custom WordPress Website (Built from Scratch)
  • Redesign & Modernization (Revamp Old Sites for a Fresh Look)
  • Business, Blog & eCommerce Websites (WooCommerce Integration)
  • Speed Optimization & Mobile Responsiveness (Lightning-Fast & User-Friendly)
  • SEO-Optimized Structure (Better Ranking & Organic Traffic)
  • Social Media & Essential Plugin Integration
  • PSD/Figma/XD/Wix to WordPress Conversion (Seamless Migration)


Why Us?

Tailor-Made Designs No Generic Templates!

SEO & Performance Optimized Faster Load Times & Higher Rankings

Unlimited Revisions 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

Easy Communication & Post-Delivery Support

Lets build a website that drives results! Click ORDER NOW and elevate your online presence today!

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am ready to proceed what you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: 1.Website Primary Objective 2.Preferred Design or branding style 3. Target Audience 4. Reference site link 5.Required content for the website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Website will be Mobile Responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! The website will be completely mobile Responsive with fast loading speed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can  i  see your portfolio or Sample work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes You can see my portfolio on my "Portfolio" section. For more samples feel free to message me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide revision after order completion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide free revisions as per the gig package. I ensure you're 100% satisfied with the final result.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you available for meeting to quick talk?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am always available for meeting on zoom to discuss your project requirements or discuss the progress on active order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you providing Domain and hosting services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not provide these services but i can guide you how to register domain and hosting then i will setup them for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Custom Quote for special functionality in my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i do provide Custom Quotation for special feature in the website or design customization.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will i able to make the edit to the website in future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes you can easily edit you wordpress website whenever you required. I will provide you a screen recorded video about "How to make the edits to the site".

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign my existing WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I can give your website a modern, professional look while improving speed, SEO, and performance.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide post-launch support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I offer support and maintenance plans to keep your website updated, secure, and running smoothly.

reviews.comment: Very happy with the outcome. I am a demanding person and sometimes I can be difficult to deal with but Muhammad Sorted my requirements very fast. He is a very kind an knowledgable person and I would recommend him going forward. Actually I know where I have to go if I have any needs :)

Coding Avenue truly SHINES in website development! His work was thorough, the website was expertly crafted, and he consistently exceeded expectations. Working with him was a breeze thanks to his quick responsiveness and proactive communication, all delivered with impressive language fluency. 👍

I recently worked with Coding Avenue Agency to build a professional WordPress Website. They were highly professional, attentive to my requirements, and delivered a polished user-friendly site that perfectly fits my needs. The team's expertise in design, functionality, and SEO optimization was evident throughout the process. Communication was seamless, and they ensured every detail was addressed. I highly recommend Coding Avenue for anyone looking for top-notch web development services!

Coding Avenue did an excellent job developing our WordPress website. They were professional, responsive, and delivered a high-quality website on time. Communication was seamless, and they implemented all our requirements efficiently. Highly recommend for any WordPress development work.

Working with Coding Avenue was a fantastic experience! Their CODE EXPERTISE truly shone through, backed by thorough documentation and a level of professionalism that is hard to come by. They went above and beyond with incredible politeness and cooperation. 😊 Highly recommend!

reviews_snippet.comment: Muhammad is a talented wordpress website designer, professional, responsive, very patient, He understood & met all my requirements. I got value for money & would recommended him for more work in the future. I'm really satisfied with the website built.
What an amazing website design he made. Fantastic service, fast delivery, extremely helpful and massive value. Will certainly use again and again in the future for my other business.
He helped me bring my ideas to life and made it so much easier! Will definitely be working with him on other projects :)

I cannot recommend Mohamed enough for anyone seeking to build a stunning website. His proficiency with WordPress coupled with his expertise in Elementor makes for an exceptional combination. Working with Mohamed was an absolute pleasure from start to finish.

One of Mohamed's standout qualities is his unwavering availability. No matter the question or concern, he was always prompt in his responses and eager to assist. This level of responsiveness instilled a sense of confidence in me throughout the project.

What truly sets Mohamed apart is his creative prowess. He has an innate ability to transform ideas into visually striking realities. His attention to detail is impeccable, ensuring that every aspect of the website is polished to perfection.

Furthermore, Mohamed's professionalism is unmatched. He consistently met deadlines and exceeded expectations, all while maintaining a calm and composed demeanor. His extensive knowledge of web development, coupled with his problem-solving skills, makes him a valuable asset to any project.

In conclusion, Mohamed is not just a WordPress developer; he is a visionary artist who brings websites to life. With his talent, dedication, and larger-than-life intellect, I have no doubt that he will continue to create awe-inspiring digital experiences for years to come.

Muhammad did an excellent job on designing and developing my WordPress website. The final design is modern, user-friendly, and perfectly aligns with my brand. Communication was seamless, and they delivered the project on time. I highly recommend Muhammad for their professionalism and expertise.
